mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_list ( mb_id, original_name, stored_name, relative_path, size, ext, type_id ) VALUES ( #{mb_id}, #{original_name}, #{stored_name}, #{relative_path}, #{size}, #{ext}, #{type_id} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM file_list WHERE mb_id = #{mb_id} AND type_id = #{type_id} AND relative_path = #{relative_path}
mapper.select: SELECT relative_path FROM file_list WHERE mb_id = #{mb_id} AND type_id = #{type_id}
SELECT file_id, original_name, size, created_at FROM file_list WHERE type_id = #{type_id} ORDER BY created_at DESC
